name: Rg.com
body:
### Welcome to Reflection Gaming
This is a new gaming website that is ready for viewers to handle and can't wait to start realeasing videos.
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```


### Twitch
We have a twitch account that has started off well and will continue to do well.
### Youtube
Our youtube channel has just started and hopes to continue for a while.
### Twitter
Follow us on twitter for updates on our channel for youtube and when we will be twitching.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
